pyrimidine.learn package¶

Submodules¶

pyrimidine.learn.regression module¶

class pyrimidine.learn.regression.GALinearRegression(**kwargs)¶

Bases: sklearn.linear_model._base.LinearRegression

Linear Regression

solve Xp = y, with min_p ||Xp-y|| + a||p||, a>=0

alpha = 0.2¶
config(X, y)¶
fit(X, y)¶

Fit linear model.

X{array-like, sparse matrix} of shape (n_samples, n_features)

Training data

yarray-like of shape (n_samples,) or (n_samples, n_targets)

Target values. Will be cast to X’s dtype if necessary

sample_weightarray-like of shape (n_samples,), default=None

Individual weights for each sample

New in version 0.17: parameter sample_weight support to LinearRegression.

self : returns an instance of self.

perf(n=10, *args, **kwargs)¶

Check the performance by running it several times

Arguments:

n {int} – running times

Returns:

number – mean time

predict(X)¶

Predict using the linear model.

Xarray_like or sparse matrix, shape (n_samples, n_features)

Samples.

Carray, shape (n_samples,)

Returns predicted values.
